wikipedia_page.main: William Randall-Hurren (born 2 May 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for EFL League Two club Sutton United.

response: William or Will Randall may refer to:
Will Randall (born 1966) is an English travel writer and language lecturer.

In the League Trophy Newport were home to Swindon Town. With the game finishing 1–1 it entered a penalty shootout. With Aaron Collins missing the seventh penalty and Will Randall scoring his, Swindon went through 7–6.
*  – Reported interest for Bournemouth for Will Randall was rebuffed.
*  – Swindon Town youth graduate Will Randall joined Wolverhampton Wanderers for an undisclosed fee.
